system.description:
Prerequisites

@UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.mm-rulebook.Item.u5uPp2qYPln7aoOz]{Psiblade Proficiency} or @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.aa-rulebook.Item.M1Cbm2LJqmpzRAFq]{Plasma Blade Proficiency}, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.mm-rulebook.Item.jViibXrHmQKko0gM]{Basic Defensive Form}

Benefits

When attempting the Deflect Reaction, the character may attempt to deflect sprayfire, sweepfire, pulsefire, double tap, and burst fire attacks

Normal

A character may not attempt to deflect sprayfire, sweepfire, pulsefire, double tap, or burst fire attacks.
